Submodules

GaussParse.app module

GaussParse.app.app_dir()[source]
GaussParse.app.collect_output_files(excel_file, sheet_name='Sheet1')[source]

read all output files from csv file and return a list

input:

excel_file: excel file sheet_name: default “Sheet1”

output:

list of output files

GaussParse.app.main()[source]
GaussParse.app.result_summary_to_excel(src: str)[source]

Convert summary result to excel file

input:
src: file | folder

file format: *.txt folder: all *.txt files in the folder

output:

excel file - return value is True
